ygData.subject: Bash and Quest info needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t get stuck at 27th like me and have pitiful 1H and bash.  I get Slam as a Troll. When I hit, I do Bash for 1 point.  I have never seen the
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Don't get stuck at 27th like me and have pitiful 1H and
bash.
<snip>

I get Slam as a Troll. When I hit, I do Bash for 1
point. I have never seen the skill incease for Slam or
Bash. Is this because I cannot officially get the Bash
skill til later levels and have not trained in it? Is
that at 10th? I'm at work and don't have my books. :)

Grobb Cleaver Quest:
What level is the Troll Nerbilik in OOT? Is the recipe
he drops a lore/no drop item? Is the HEHE meat lore/no
drop? I know the chef will kill me so i was planning on
either making a mule ogre or paying someone to get it
for me.
After getting into Freeport via the tunnels to catch the
boat for OOT will the guards on the pier KoS me? Are all
Trolls Kos in freeport regardless of religion? Will
killing Orcs in North Ro increase my faction with the
Freeport Militia or will I need to kill green Deathfists
in the Freeport newbie zone? Will I ever kill enough to
let me not be KoS as an SK of Thule?
Thanks.
Lots of questions, but I prefer not to die alot and not
be able to get my corpse back. :)

--
Cronik
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
9th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
